name: Start Clean New Tab Page
description: Open a new tab with a clean & fast ui.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://en.wikipedia.org https://api.duckduckgo.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://code.jquery.com https://clients1.google.com https://cse.google.com https://www.google.com https://www.googleapis.com 'unsafe-eval'; object-src 'self'
